meanings.definition: Of or relating to the parotid gland.
meanings.sent1: The doctor examined the parotid gland to check for any abnormalities.
meanings.sent2: The parotid swelling indicated a possible infection.
meanings.sent3: The parotid gland, being so close to the ear, seems like it could hear everything!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as refreshing as a healthy parotid gland.
meanings.sent5: The parotid characteristics of the gland made it stand out in the medical report.

meanings.definition: The largest salivary gland, located near the ear.
meanings.sent1: She felt a sharp pain near her parotid while eating.
meanings.sent2: The parotid produces saliva to aid in digestion.
meanings.sent3: The parotid gland decided to throw a party, and the submandibular gland was invited too!
meanings.sent4: His words flowed smoothly, like saliva from a healthy parotid gland.
meanings.sent5: The parotid gland's position near the ear made it easy to locate during the examination.
